subjectArea.name: SCM - COGS and Gross Margin
subjectArea.description: This subject area provides ability to analyze cost of good sold (COGS) and gross margin by business unit, cost book, customers, product and associated dimensions. And supports revenue generated from account receivable subledger only.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - COGS And Gross Margin
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cogs and Gross Margin.Recognized Revenue
